description: Transcribe and extract data from audio using AssemblyAI's Speech AI.

actions.name: purgeLemurRequestData
actions.description:
Delete the data for a previously submitted LeMUR request.
The LLM response data, as well as any context provided in the original request will be removed.

actions.name: getLemurResponse
actions.description: Retrieve a LeMUR response that was previously generated.

actions.name: lemurTask
actions.description: Use the LeMUR task endpoint to input your own LLM prompt.

actions.name: getTranscript
actions.description: Retrieves a transcript by its ID.

actions.name: getTranscriptSentences
actions.description: Retrieve the sentences of the transcript by its ID.

actions.name: transcribe
actions.description: Transcribe an audio or video file using AssemblyAI.

actions.name: wordSearch
actions.description: Search through the transcript for keywords.

actions.name: getTranscriptParagraphs
actions.description: Retrieve the paragraphs of the transcript by its ID.

actions.name: deleteTranscript
actions.description: Remove the data from the transcript and mark it as deleted.

actions.name: listTranscripts
actions.description:
Retrieve a list of transcripts you created.
Transcripts are sorted from newest to oldest. The previous URL always points to a page with older transcripts.

actions.name: getRedactedAudio
actions.description: Get the result of the redacted audio model.

actions.name: getSubtitles
actions.description: Export the transcript as SRT or VTT subtitles.

actions.name: uploadFile
actions.description: The File or URL of the audio or video file.
